info.title: DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogManagementClient
info.description: Creates an Azure Data Lake Analytics catalog client.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The Azure Data Lake Analytics account upon which to execute catalog operations.

get.description: Retrieves the list of all table valued functions in a database from the Data Lake Analytics catalog.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database containing the table valued functions.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of items to return. Optional.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of items to skip over before returning elements. Optional.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: OData Select statement. Limits the properties on each entry to just those requested, e.g. Categories?$select=CategoryName,Description. Optional.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: OrderBy clause. One or more comma-separated expressions with an optional "asc" (the default) or "desc" depending on the order you'd like the values sorted, e.g. Categories?$orderby=CategoryName desc. Optional.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: The Boolean value of true or false to request a count of the matching resources included with the resources in the response, e.g. Categories?$count=true. Optional.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of all table valued functions in the specified database.

get.x-internal-toc-name: List Table Valued Functions By Database

post.description: Grants an access control list (ACL) entry to the Data Lake Analytics catalog.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or update an access control list (ACL) entry for a Data Lake Analytics catalog.

parameters.name: op
parameters.description: The constant value for the operation.

200.description: Successfully granted the access control list (ACL) entry to the Data Lake Analytics catalog.

post.description: Grants an access control list (ACL) entry to the database from the Data Lake Analytics catalog.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or update an access control list (ACL) entry for a database.

parameters.name: op
parameters.description: The constant value for the operation.

200.description: Successfully granted the access control list (ACL) entry to the specified database.

post.description: Revokes an access control list (ACL) entry from the Data Lake Analytics catalog.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to delete an access control list (ACL) entry from a Data Lake Analytics catalog.

parameters.name: op
parameters.description: The constant value for the operation.

200.description: Successfully revoked the access control list (ACL) entry from the Data Lake Analytics catalog.

post.description: Revokes an access control list (ACL) entry for the database from the Data Lake Analytics catalog.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to delete an access control list (ACL) entry for a database.

parameters.name: op
parameters.description: The constant value for the operation.

200.description: Successfully revoked the access control list (ACL) entry from the specified database.

aceType.description: the access control list (ACL) entry type. UserObj and GroupObj denote the owning user and group, respectively.

principalId.description: the Azure AD object ID of the user or group being specified in the access control list (ACL) entry.

permission.description: the permission type of the access control list (ACL) entry.

AclCreateOrUpdateParameters.description: The parameters used to create or update an access control list (ACL) entry.

aceType.description: the access control list (ACL) entry type. UserObj and GroupObj denote the owning user and group, respectively.

principalId.description: the Azure AD object ID of the user or group being specified in the access control list (ACL) entry.

AclDeleteParameters.description: The parameters used to delete an access control list (ACL) entry.

aceType.description: the access control list (ACL) entry type. UserObj and GroupObj denote the owning user and group, respectively.

principalId.description: the Azure AD object ID of the user or group being specified in the access control list (ACL) entry.

permission.description: the permission type of the access control list (ACL) entry.

Acl.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog access control list (ACL) entry.

AclList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog access control list (ACL).

password.description: the password for the secret to pass in

uri.description: the URI identifier for the secret in the format <hostname>:<port>

DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogSecretCreateOrUp.description: Data Lake Analytics catalog secret creation and update parameters. This is deprecated and will be removed in the next release. Please use DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogCredentialCreateOrUpdateParameters instead.

password.description: the password for the credential and user with access to the data source.

uri.description: the URI identifier for the data source this credential can connect to in the format <hostname>:<port>

userId.description: the object identifier for the user associated with this credential with access to the data source.

DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogCredentialCreate.description: Data Lake Analytics catalog credential creation parameters.

password.description: the current password for the credential and user with access to the data source. This is required if the requester is not the account owner.

DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogCredentialDelete.description: Data Lake Analytics catalog credential deletion parameters.

password.description: the current password for the credential and user with access to the data source. This is required if the requester is not the account owner.

newPassword.description: the new password for the credential and user with access to the data source.

uri.description: the URI identifier for the data source this credential can connect to in the format <hostname>:<port>

userId.description: the object identifier for the user associated with this credential with access to the data source.

DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogCredentialUpdate.description: Data Lake Analytics catalog credential update parameters.

creationTime.description: the creation time of the credential object. This is the only information returned about a secret from a GET.

uri.description: the URI identifier for the secret in the format <hostname>:<port>

password.description: the password for the secret to pass in

USqlSecret.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL secret item.

externalDataSourceName.description: the name of the external data source.

provider.description: the name of the provider for the external data source.

providerString.description: the name of the provider string for the external data source.

schemaName.description: the name of the schema associated with this procedure and database.

value.description: the list of procedure in the database and schema combination

USqlProcedureList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL procedure item list.

name.description: the name of the column in the table.

type.description: the object type of the specified column (such as System.String).

USqlTableColumn.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL table column item.

name.description: the name of the index in the table.

descending.description: the switch indicating if the index is descending or not.

USqlDirectedColumn.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL directed column item.

keys.description: the list of directed columns in the distribution

count.description: the count of indices using this distribution.

dynamicCount.description: the dynamic count of indices using this distribution.

USqlDistributionInfo.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL distribution information object.

name.description: the name of the index in the table.

indexKeys.description: the list of directed columns in the index

columns.description: the list of columns in the index

distributionInfo.description: the distributions info of the index

partitionFunction.description: partition function ID for the index.

partitionKeyList.description: the list of partition keys in the index

streamNames.description: the list of full paths to the streams that contain this index in the DataLake account.

isColumnstore.description: the switch indicating if this index is a columnstore index.

indexId.description: the ID of this index within the table.

isUnique.description: the switch indicating if this index is a unique index.

USqlIndex.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL table index item.

firstPart.description: the name of the table associated with this database and schema.

secondPart.description: the name of the table associated with this database and schema.

thirdPart.description: the name of the table associated with this database and schema.

server.description: the name of the table associated with this database and schema.

DdlName.description: A Data Lake Analytics DDL name item.

name.description: the name of the external table associated with this database, schema and table.

version.description: the version of the external data source.

EntityId.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog entity identifier object.

tableName.description: the name of the table associated with this database and schema.

dataSource.description: the data source associated with this external table.

ExternalTable.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog external table item.

name.description: the name of the field associated with this type.

TypeFieldInfo.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog type field information item.

totalRowCount.description: the total number of rows in the table or partition.

totalColumnCount.description: the total number of columns in the table or partition.

rows.description: the rows of the table or partition preview, where each row is an array of string representations the row's values. Note: Byte arrays will appear as base-64 encoded values, SqlMap and SqlArray objects will appear as escaped JSON objects, and DateTime objects will appear as ISO formatted UTC date-times.

truncated.description: true if the amount of data in the response is less than expected due to the preview operation's size limitations. This can occur if the requested rows or row counts are too large.

schema.description: the schema of the table or partition.

USqlTablePreview.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog table or partition preview rows item.

indexList.description: the list of indices in this table

fragmentId.description: the version of the catalog item.

size.description: the data size of the table fragment in bytes.

rowCount.description: the number of rows in the table fragment.

streamPath.description: the relative path for the table fragment location.

adlaCatalogDnsSuffixInPath.name: adlaCatalogDnsSuffix
adlaCatalogDnsSuffixInPath.description: Gets the DNS suffix used as the base for all Azure Data Lake Analytics Catalog service requests.
